Hi,

I have built a wrapper around tf.layers.Conv2D. I want to define the layer weights explicitly in the graph as a tensor and then add it to the layer. I want to use the weights multiple times during the training phase.

Something like:

layer_weights = tf.get_variable(name,shape)
x = my_custom_layer(x, weights, args..)

I want to know what should I write in the build function of the custom layer to set the layer weights to a pre-defined tensor. Please Help.

I'm following this to create the custom layer: https://keras.io/layers/writing-your-own-keras-layers/
